game.name: Baspetball
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: When the tutors leave, the house turns into a basketball court, and the ultimate showdown begins: Cats vs. Dogs. Take control of basketball-playing cats, move, pass, and shoot a yarn ball to score baskets while outsmarting dog opponents. Explore creative strategies and make that swish!
game.shortDescriptionEn: When the tutors leave, the house turns into a basketball court, and the ultimate showdown begins: Cats vs. Dogs. Take control of basketball-playing cats, move, pass, and shoot a yarn ball to score baskets while outsmarting dog opponents. Explore creative strategies and make that swish!
